meanings.definition: Aeradios (noun): a type of electronic device used for communication.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my aeradios when I go hiking in case of emergencies.
meanings.sent2: The pilot used the aeradios to communicate with the control tower.
meanings.sent3: The aeradios started playing music instead of transmitting messages!
meanings.sent4: Her voice traveled through the aeradios like a whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The aeradios crackled to life, filling the room with static.

meanings.definition: Aeradios (adjective): relating to or characteristic of the use of radio waves for communication.
meanings.sent1: The aeradios technology has revolutionized long-distance communication.
meanings.sent2: We rely on aeradios signals to broadcast news and music across the country.
meanings.sent3: The aeradios waves danced through the air, carrying messages far and wide.
meanings.sent4: His words had an aeradios quality, reaching her heart with invisible waves.
meanings.sent5: The aeradios connection remained strong even in the midst of the storm.
